Company Introduction & Mission

Persefoni’s mission is to enable every organization and person with the technology to positively impact the health of planet Earth. Persefoni has created an all-in-one platform that allows organizations to measure, analyze, and reduce their Enterprise Carbon Footprint. Our goal is to provide our customers unprecedented visibility and insights into the impact their organization has on the environment. Leveraging the latest breakthroughs in data science and software, our technology will empower teams and leaders to mobilize their organizations to disclose their organization's climate posture with the same confidence as their financial disclosure, continuously improve, and set and track science-based climate targets. One of Persefoni’s target customer segments is the Private Markets, which includes Private Equity, Private Credit, Venture Capital, Real Assets, Fund of Funds, Co-investors, and Secondaries.

Our Core Values
• Sustainability - We are committed to sustainable business practices across our entire operation and culture. We go beyond achieving balance. We are a net-positive contributor to the environment, our employee’s lives, and the global community.
• Impact - We are focused on and passionate about tackling the biggest and hardest problems that will have the greatest impact. We create significant, not incremental, solutions.
• Collaboration - We are always aligned in our goals and efforts to create the most impactful technologies possible. Constant cooperation across our company, customers, and partners is our standard mode of operating.
• Equality - We value and respect people and organizations of all backgrounds. Ours is a culture of innovation, creativity, diversity of thought, and inclusion.

About the Department

The Solutions team at Persefoni encompasses all customer-facing employees engaging with organizations to enable them to calculate, manage, and report on their carbon footprint utilizing the Persefoni SaaS platform, including the Sales organization. The objective of the Solutions group as a whole is to provide technical and business expertise to customers and internal teams both pre and post-sale to ensure customers are realizing a return on their Persefoni investment. The mission of the Sales team is to provide a solution-oriented buying experience for every customer that engenders trust and confidence in Persefoni and enables significant and sustainable growth for the company.

About The Role

The Senior Sales Director role focused on the Private Markets requires solution selling, Private Markets fundraising/business development, or enterprise software sales experience. This is a commercially-focused role that will suit a customer facing field sales leader in the US and involve collaboration with Persefoni’s Climate Solution Directors, Customer Success, Product, Marketing and engineering organizations. You will have a successful track record in the development of sales, business development, or capital-raising strategy and execution, building brand awareness and sales across a broad portfolio of clients, and a demonstrable passion for global sustainability/carbon/climate related developments.

As a key member of the Persefoni Solutions Sales team, the Senior Sales Director will be responsible for growing and retaining annual recurring revenue (ARR). This will involve building relationships with prospective customers; selling and closing new platform subscriptions; and successfully preparing customers for platform onboarding. The ability to lead through influence across direct and indirect reporting relationships is critical, and experience in building and leading a team would be advantageous.

Responsibilities (What we expect)
• Lead customer facing activities including inbound lead triage, first contact, discovery calls, platform demos, follow-up communication, presenting Persefoni solutions, coordinating internal resources, strategizing on proposals, and negotiating and closing sales
• Grow annual recurring revenue (ARR), helping the Persefoni team meet quarterly and annual goals
• Steward the sales process to support end-to-end customer acquisition, including winning new business, account management, revenue retention, revenue expansion, and an ongoing positive experience of successful impact for our customers
• Collaborate with various Persefoni teams such as marketing, legal, product, solution directors, and customer success to deliver a unified customer experience
• Maintain an accurate CRM with information across the sales lifecycle to include past events and planned tasks, relevant customer details, and sales revenue forecasts
• Ensure that all required paperwork and documentation is properly organized, executed, and stored to successfully book subscriptions and manage customer accounts
• Identify opportunities for participation in relevant industry events, engagements & potential partnerships

Role Expectations
• Within your first 2 weeks, you will be able to:
• Articulate how Persefoni incorporates carbon accounting standards and sustainability reporting frameworks in its solutions
• Demonstrate the Persefoni platform and bring together the appropriate Persefoni resources in customer facing meetings
• Be proficient in using Persefoni systems and processes to appropriately track and report on relevant sales activities and customer information
• Within your first 2 months:
• Demonstrated expertise in managing a conversation with a prospective Persefoni customer
• Ability to lead discovery, platform demo, and follow-up conversations with prospective customers
• Ability to answer customers’ frequently asked questions on carbon accounting, climate change, and the Persefoni platform
• Within your first year, you will have:
• Helped the Persefoni team achieve strategic market share and revenue goals
• Identified areas for strategic company revenue growth within your defined territory assignment & contributed to internal systems, processes, product and sales material development to support proactively tackling new opportunities

Skills & Experience
• At least seven (7) years of total experience across: solutions sales, Private Markets business development or fundraising, and/or enterprise software sales experience
• Expertise in selling software solutions into Private Markets customers is a plus
• Ability to manage relationships internally and externally with individuals ranging from individual contributors to the C-suite, in addition to working/negotiating with C-suite
• An engaging phone & video presence in addition to exemplary written and verbal skills
• Experience influencing change in complex, global organizations & comfortable operating within a fast-paced, global team
• Expertise in understanding value creation based on customer needs with full sales cycle experience to include qualifying opportunities, strategic outreach, pitching solutions, RFP response management, developing and presenting proposals, running / coordinating technical workshops, negotiating contracts and closing sales
• A bachelor’s degree from an accredited university

Interview Process
• Step 1: Interview with Talent Acquisition
• Step 2: Interview with Global Head of Sales
• Step 3: Interview with VP of Private Markets
• Step 4: Final interview with President of Solutions Group
• Step 5: Offer extended
• Step 6: Background check and onboarding

Benefit Offerings
• Generous PTO policy
• 401k with company match
• Medical, dental, and vision insurance
• Disability, life insurance
• Equity incentive plan

Persefoni is an Equal Opportunity employer

One of our company Core Values is 'Equality' which emphasizes our commitment to value and respect people and organizations of all backgrounds. We proudly bring this to life by fostering a culture of innovation, creativity, diversity of thought, and inclusion.

We strive for each of our team members to be able to show up for work every day as their genuine selves. Similar to the reverence given to Earth’s biodiversity, we recognize the vast potential that exists when all of the facets of diversity within our team are appreciated and illuminated. This policy extends to all aspects of our employment practices.

As you are considering us as a potential employer, it's important to ensure you are aware we currently have a COVID-19 vaccination policy in place for all U.S. employees.

The key tenets of our policy are:
• Fully remote employees, those who are not doing any travel and do not have any in-person interactions related to their work, are not required to be vaccinated.
• Employees who travel on behalf of Persefoni and/or have in-person interactions related to their work, are required to be fully vaccinated and boosted.
• All employees, regardless of vaccination status, are required to inform us of whether they are fully vaccinated or not.
• We provide the opportunity for employees to request special exceptions to the policy for medical, religious, and other reasons
